text: Need Aria Perez for Red Rooster campaign. Budget around $3,559, looking for 1 x Facebook story, 1 x Instagram reel, 1 x Instagram post, 3 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x YouTube short. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
